com.socrata.api

Class HttpLowLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.socrata.api.HttpLowLevel

  • public final class HttpLowLevel
extends Object
    Class to handle all the low level HTTP operations. This class provides the core data access methods for GET, PUT, POST, DELETE and wraps the appropriate authentications set-up for the connection. This library is based off the Jersey JAX-RS implementation. Most of this is hidden from the caller, but the Client object is available in case custom filters are required.

                            @Nullable
                            String token)
        Create an HttpLowLevel object that is set-up with the appropriate authentication credentials.
        Parameters:
        url - the base URL for the SODA2 domain to access.
        userName - user name to log in as
        password - password to log in with
        token - the App Token to use for authorization and usage tracking. If this is null, no value will be sent.
        Returns:
        HttpLowLevel object that is completely configured to use.

      • follow202

        public com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientResponse follow202(URI uri,
                                                 javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType mediaType,
                                                 long retryTime,
                                                 SodaRequest request2Rerun)
                                                   throws InterruptedException,
                                                          LongRunningQueryException,
                                                          SodaError
        Follows a 202 response that comes back for long running queries.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI to go back to
        retryTime - the amount of time to wait for a retry
        Returns:
        the ClientResponse from this operation
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if this thread is interrupted
        LongRunningQueryException - thrown if this query is long running and a 202 is returned. In this case, the caller likely wants to call follow202.
        SodaError - thrown if there is an error. Investigate the structure for more information.

      • getAsyncResults

        public final <T> T getAsyncResults(URI uri,
                    long waitTime,
                    long numRetries,
                    Class<T> cls,
                    SodaRequest request2Rerun)
                        throws SodaError,
                               InterruptedException
        Method to check the async callbacks for new responses.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI to go to for responses.
        waitTime - the time to wait until the first response
        numRetries - the total number of times to retry before failing.
        cls - the class of the object to return.
        Returns:
        the object returned for a successful response.
        Throws:
        SodaError - thrown if there is an error. Investigate the structure for more information.
        InterruptedException - throws is the thread is interrupted.

      • deleteRaw

        public com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientResponse deleteRaw(URI uri)
                                                   throws LongRunningQueryException,
                                                          SodaError
        Raw version of the API for issuing a delete, doing common error processing and returning the ClientResponse.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI to issue a request to. Any id information should have already been added.
        Returns:
        the raw ClientReponse to the request. Any errors will have already been processed, and have thrown and exception.
        Throws:
        LongRunningQueryException - thrown if this query is long running and a 202 is returned. In this case, the caller likely wants to call follow202.
        SodaError - thrown if there is an error. Investigate the structure for more information.

        Throws:

        SodaError - thrown if there is an error. Investigate the structure for more information.

      • postRaw

        public com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientResponse postRaw(URI uri,
                                               javax.ws.rs.core.MediaType mediaType,
                                               Object object)
                                                 throws LongRunningQueryException,
                                                        SodaError
        Issues a raw POST to a URI. The URI should be properly formed, and the response will process the errors and throw if there are any.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI to issue a request to. Any id information should have already been added.
        mediaType - the MIME type the object is to be sent to the server as.
        object - the object to send down to the server. This can be a Jackson serializable object or a raw InputStream.
        Returns:
        the raw ClientReponse to the request. Any errors will have already been processed, and have thrown and exception.
        Throws:
        LongRunningQueryException - thrown if this query is long running and a 202 is returned. In this case, the caller likely wants to call follow202.
        SodaError - thrown if there is an error. Investigate the structure for more information.
